item.title: Use NVIDIA Cuda in Docker for Data Science Projects
item.description: When I was working with data science project running in Docker, I found that working with huge data can be problematic. Even tools like PyArrow is not fast enough in Docker. But when I debugged the logs, I saw that if I could give it access to NVIDIA Cuda, then it would be much faster.
